attributes.action: Ensure that teh Prime Minister is elected by Members of the Public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been widely reported that Tony Blair will be stepping down as Prime Minister in the not too distant future.
I feel his replacement should not automatically be Gordon Brown but someone from the Government chosen by the Public.This petition therefore is to register your objection to Gordon Brown automatically becoming Prime Minister by defualt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
